title: DAZ3D - Poser - Anderson Hall Bundle
description:
ANDERSON HALL BUNDLE
--------------------

Latest versions of the Anderson Hall products, uploaded because existing uploads elsewhere between the original products and the Iray addons seem to be incompatible with each other. 

Anderson Hall and Vestibule contain both Daz Studio and Poser files. Iray addons are Daz Studio only


This bundle contains:


Anderson Hall
-------------
 
https://cdn.pximg.xyz/0b7748b2090b85f9d7a1e421b3a2002a.jpg

www.daz3d.com/catalog/product/view/id/14119

Anderson Hall - an elegant, Baroque inspired entrance hall which is perfect for all types of scenes. This highly detailed and modular set features everything you need to create a full 360 degree interior. All the fixtures and fittings are removable for ease use and to limit the system resources required to use it. Also included is the DS lightset as used in the promo artwork.


Anderson Hall Iray Addon
------------------------
 
https://cdn.pximg.xyz/f9826f4bbffd729358565c6b32d8123c.jpg

www.daz3d.com/catalog/product/view/id/31166

This addon set updates the original Anderson Hall product with all new Iray materials. In addition, the 3D scene files as used in the promo artwork are also included. Please note that the original Anderson Hall is required for use and make certain you are using the latest version of the model.


Anderson Hall Vestibule
-----------------------
 
https://cdn.pximg.xyz/5e51e286c30a8e9ad7aaac206113a5b1.jpg

www.daz3d.com/catalog/product/view/id/18017

Anderson Hall Vestibule is an elegant, Baroque inspired interior designed to compliment the original Anderson Hall product. Instead of the vast hall of the original, this is smaller, offering an asymmetrical staircase leading to an upper room/entrance way. This highly detailed and modular set features everything you need to create a full interior. All the fixtures and fittings are removable for ease of use and to limit the system resources required to use it. Further expansions will be released to build on these products to increase the versatility of the Anderson Hall range. Also included is the DS lightset (both DS 3.1.2.32+ and 4.6+) as used in the promo artwork.


Anderson Hall Vestibule Iray Addon
----------------------------------
 
https://cdn.pximg.xyz/4a0ee0e5f18b86df1d4b1d5caaa3a913.jpg

www.daz3d.com/catalog/product/view/id/33451

This addon set updates the original Anderson Hall Vestibule product with all new Iray materials. In addition, the scene files as used in the promo artwork are also included. Please note that the original Anderson Hall is required for use, and that you are using the latest version
